1.text: Consider when the avocado was harvested.

5.text: Hold the avocado in the palm of your hand.
5.vid: /0/07/Tell if an Avocado Is Ripe Step 5.360p.mp4

7.text: Squeeze the avocado in several places.
7.vid: /e/e9/Tell if an Avocado Is Ripe Step 7 Version 3.360p.mp4

8.text: Give the avocado a gentle shake.
8.vid: /8/88/Tell if an Avocado Is Ripe Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.vid: /1/1a/Tell if an Avocado Is Ripe Step 9 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.text: Check the color beneath the stem.

11.text: Brush both sides of the avocado with lemon juice.
11.vid: /c/cd/Tell if an Avocado Is Ripe Step 11.360p.mp4

12.vid: /9/9b/Tell if an Avocado Is Ripe Step 12.360p.mp4

13.text: Tightly wrap the avocado in plastic wrap.
13.vid: /1/19/Tell if an Avocado Is Ripe Step 13 Version 3.360p.mp4

15.text: Refrigerate the avocado until it’s ripe.
